wikipedia_page.main: Michael Wright (born 17 February 1950) is an English former footballer who made 89 appearances in the Football League for Darlington in the 1960s and 1970s. A defender, he went on to play non-league football for Crook Town.

response: *Mick Wright (footballer, born 1946), English football right back with Aston Villa
